item.description:
Guys,
Happy New Year!! Since the people I have heard from don't seem to have a problem with Mondays, I have decided to change the meet up day to Mondays, still at 6. I hope that works for everyone else as well!! We had a great meet up before Christmas and I hope we can continue to increase the size of our group!!! Also, if anyone would like to run any other days during the week, please let me know. I am running a half marathon in March and I would love to have training buddies!! Thanks guys!! See you next week!!
item.name: Track workout!!!
